card.name: Juranail, Seven Quakes World King
card.text: ■ World Breaker ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you have 6 or less nature cards in your mana zone, this creature doesn't untap.

card.name: Commanduo, Order Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Nitro Flag, Sonic
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ If your opponent has 2 shields or less, each of your fire creatures gets "speed attacker". ''(A creatures that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Box, Invader
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ This creature can't be blocked.

card.name: Flaming Meracchi
card.text: ■ Your fire evolution creatures cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ While battling, this creature can't be destroyed.

card.name: Cylinder, Revolution Dragon Formula
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your water creatures in the battle zone. ■ Revolution 2—When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, until the start of your next turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack or block.

card.name: Dark Masters, Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard up to 3 cards from it.

card.name: Mega Manalock Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose a card from each civilization in your opponent's mana zone and tap it. Those cards don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Sturm, Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less.

card.name: Tenzan, Sinister Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top 13 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Death Hands, Misfortune Emperor
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Iron Fist of Revolution
card.text: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell For No Cost ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck and choose a fire creature from among them. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has the same as or less power than that creature. ■ After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

card.name: Gatling, Sonic
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Black Psycho, Revenge
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.

card.name: Gachanko Gachirobo
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If all are creatures that have the same cost, put them. Otherwise, put them on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ If your opponent has 2 shields or less, your Water creatures can't be attacked or blocked.

card.name: Myscu, Mirage
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then that player shuffles their deck and reveals the top card. If it's a creature, that player may put it in the battle zone For No Cost

card.name: Schild Polka
card.text: ■ Shield Saver ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Talbot, Sonic
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Cyber I Choice
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, you may use a card that has "shield trigger" from your hand For No Cost

card.name: Ajarashi, Invader
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger

card.name: Revolution Taiman
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature. Until your next turn, that creature gets +4000 power and can't attack players. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, until the start of your next turn your opponent's creatures can't attack you.

card.name: Chake, Snow Faerie
card.text: ■ Shield Saver ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Red Rose, Crimson Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. ■ Mana Arms
